typeProperties.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source1
source1 keyGenerate(output(rownum as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> AddRowNums
AddRowNums derive(datalines = iif(!isNull(toInteger(left(toString(byPosition(1)),1))),toInteger(rownum),toInteger(9999999))) ~> DefineDataLines
DefineDataLines aggregate(firstline = min(datalines)) ~> FindFirstLine
FindFirstLine sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['skiplines.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink1
